attributes.action: All healthcare and supermarket workers to have 56 days paid holiday in 2021
attributes.additional_details: To show support and thanks to frontline workers many of whom risked their lives to keep the country going during these unprecedented times
attributes.background: Anyone who couldn’t work from home and wasn’t furloughed during the pandemic, to have an extra 28 days paid annual leave in 2021, as a thank you for supporting the rest of country during the pandemic

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Employers (including the NHS) are responsible for deciding on annual leave entitlements, not the UK Government or Parliament.
